data.title: The House With a Clock In Its Walls trailer: Jack Black, Cate Blanchett team-up to fight magical pumpkins
meta_keywords: The House With a Clock In Its Walls
data.meta_description: KyleÂ MacLachlan also stars in the gothic fantasy
data.text:

Eli Roth has proven himself as a horror filmmaker (Hostel) but not as a helmer of children's movies. With The House With a Clock In Its Walls, an adaptation of John Bellairs gothic fantasy, the director and Inglorious Basterds actor looks to change that.

Starring Jack Black, Cate Blanchett, and Kyle MacLachlan, along with introducing Owen Vaccaro, the movie looks heaps of fun.

The new trailer sees Black and Blanchett reveal themselves as powerful controllers of magic who attempt to teach Vaccaro's young character their ways. However, the last tenant of their spooky mansion installed a clock in th walls (hence the title) which is counting down to something ominous happening.

25 new films to look out for in 2018 that aren't sequels

Show all 25

Produced by Spielberg's Amblin Entertainment and writer Eric Kripke, the The House With a Clock In Its Walls reaches cinemas 21 September.
